## Quarto

{{< fa envelope >}}

You can use any of the fontawesome icons that are free. Click [here](https://fontawesome.com/search?m=free) for the full list!

To include brand icons in your Quarto documents, add the word "brands" before the name of the icon.

<span style="color:red">{{< fa brands facebook size=5x >}}</span>
